title: Amazon Can Help PayPal Get Through a Rough Patch
sub_head: A changing relationship with eBay is putting pressure on PayPalâ€™s growth, and it needs a stronger spending rebound and new partnerships to offset that
body:
PayPal is still feeling some of the effects of its breakup with eBay several years ago. But now it has a new relationship with Amazon.com .
After huge growth through the pandemic, like most payments players, PayPal is facing tougher comparisons going forward as it seeks further expansion. But in addition to having to show it can keep up the momentum with e-commerce and other digital payments and services, it also has to make up for declining volumes from eBay. PayPal shares were down more than 10% Tuesday after posting earnings.
